text: (Kubera ihohoterwa bakorerwaga), babandi bemeye baravuze bati "Kuki tudahishurirwa isura [(igice cya Qur’an) (iduha uburenganzira bwo kurwanya abaduhohotera)]?" Ariko iyo isura ihishuwe (igira ibyo isobanura cyangwa itegeka) hakavugwamo imirwano, ubona babandi bafite uburwayi mu mitima yabo bakureba indoro isa nk’iy’uwagushijwe igihumure n’urupfu. Nyamara icyangombwa kuri bo
